contexts.context: ...throughout the paper. Two snakes drawn on the <mark>top</mark> of the paper. A drawing of the hammermill...
...right is a yellowish colored dessert with frosting on <mark>top</mark> and cherries around it. Two more desserts are drawn...
...with gold.The facades are surmount by irregular roofs <mark>topped</mark> with the emblems of the guilds A baket,...
...IN- Took pictures of the storks on the chimney <mark>tops</mark>. They return these nests about May 8th...
